group_1.textLeft: Maaan, it was so much fun!

group_1.textRight: Since the goal was to give you a break, Princess,@I'm quite glad you're satisfied.

group_1.textLeft: That's right, that's right!
It's kind of refreshing to be like, regular students!

group_1.textRight: I'm...a bit tired.

group_1.textLeft: But you had fun, right?

group_1.textRight: Yeah... Just a bit...
Since it's getting late, perhaps it's about time we@go our separate ways for today.

group_1.textLeft: That's right.

group_1.textRight: Well then, we'll be on our way.
See you tomorrow!

group_1.textLeft: Mhm, see ya!★
We'll go home first, then.

group_1.textRight: It'd be a problem if Kamihama Magical Girls saw us@with Princess...

group_1.textLeft: Please be careful, you two.

group_1.textRight: Mhm...

group_1.textLeft: Then, we'll see you tomorrow...!

group_1.textCenter: It all started with a misunderstanding on this@cutie's part, but...
I feel like my bond with everyone has gotten WAY@deeper!★

group_1.textRight: That was so much fun, Hime-chan!♪

group_1.textLeft: Sasha, you sang so well, like, it scared me!

group_1.textRight: [chara:103501:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Thank you very much.
I received compliments from everyone, it made@a wonderful memory!♪

group_1.textLeft: ...Hey. By that you mean, like...
You got to make some good memories before@leaving Kamihama City...
...Something like that, right?

group_1.textRight: Huh... What are you talking about?

group_1.textLeft: I mean, you're moving out, yeah? 'Cause your@uncle's kickin' you out?

group_1.textRight: Well, that's for a room renovation.
Because of that, I'm moving out of the place I've@been renting from my uncle...

group_1.textLeft: ...So, you *are* moving away?

group_1.textRight: It's a misunderstanding.
I talked to my uncle yesterday about where to move.
He's going to arrange for me to move into another@place in the Kamihama area, you see.

group_1.textLeft: What the heck, why didn't you tell me earlier?@It's this cutie's mistake again!

group_1.textRight: *Giggle*♪
Well, I'm glad to know you think I'm so necessary.@I had no idea.

group_1.textLeft: Mhm. I'll do whatever it takes to keep you by my@side, Sasha!

group_1.textRight: Oh my gosh, Hime-chan...

group_1.textLeft: Heck, if you would've been better off without your@uncle, I would've made that happen too.

group_1.textRight: Um, Hime-chan...?
What do you mean if I would've been better off@without him...?

group_1.textLeft: Like, I can make him go away, y'know?
This cutie isn't gonna forgive no one who dares@stand in her way.
Toldya that before, yeah?

group_1.textRight: (I knew Hime-chan could be dangerous when@she gets out of control, but...)
(If she starts hurting people with impunity,
I won't be able to keep up with her...)

group_1.textLeft: C'mon, let's both go home ASAP!★
We gotta be careful so other Magical Girls don't@spot us, right?

group_1.textRight: That's right...isn't it...

group_1.textLeft: I mean, if your voice didn't reach me back then,
I would've died to despair, and Neo-Magius@would've disappeared, you know!
So c'mon, Sasha!
From now on, continue to support this cutie and@everyone as a member of our organization, okay?!

group_1.textCenter: (I'd like us to create a world where everyone can@love freely together.)
(But harming someone else for that is not the way.)
(As the one who brought Hime-chan to Neo-Magius,@I want to stop her before that happens...)

group_1.textLeft: Sasha, you don’t wanna go home yet or something?

group_1.textRight: ...*Giggle* Oops, guess I got found out.

group_1.textLeft: Sure then, let's take a little detour!
I've still got LOADS to talk to ya about, y'know!★

group_1.textCenter: ALWAYS stay by my side, Sasha!
